authors.author: unknown
authors.sample: If it’s an app/device bug, send the error + steps to reproduce (and your device/app version).
authors.replyShort: Thanks for checking in — let’s get you a real status update. Share your wallet + an in-app screenshot for Founder Pass/OYS. I’ll reconcile any mismatch (DM ok).
authors.draft:
@unknown Thanks for calling this out. You're right to be frustrated.
On shipping: can you drop your order number (or last 4 digits) and country/region? We'll check your status and give you a concrete ETA.
On claims/rewards: tell me what you see in-app (screenshot is ok). We'll verify your Founder Pass / OYS allocation and fix any mismatch.
On support: if you already opened a ticket, paste the ticket number and we'll pick it up.
If it's an app/device issue, share the error or steps to reproduce and we'll triage it fast.
If you prefer, DM me your details and I'll handle it 1:1.
I saw your message: "If it’s an app/device bug, send the error + steps to reproduce (and your device/app version)."
